articles.title: Sainsbury's CEO's pay triples to £3.8m as firm rejects living wage calls - The Guardian
articles.description: Supermarket faces vote from investors to pay a living wage to all workers, including contractors
articles.content: Sainsburys has revealed that its chief executive, Simon Roberts, received pay worth £3.8m in the latest financial year even as it rejected calls from big investors for it to ensure all workers in its… [+2902 chars]
